item.title: Version 0.15.2
item.description:
SupaSidebar 0.15.2

What’s New

  • Natural Swipe Direction: Swipe direction for switching spaces now matches macOS Mission Control by default (swipe left → next space). You can toggle this in Preferences → Sidebar → Gestures.
  • Show on Finder: Sidebar now stays visible when switching to Finder, making it easy to drag and drop files into the sidebar. Enabled by default, configurable in Preferences → Sidebar.

Improvements

  • Manual hide notification (“Auto-show Paused”) now auto-disables after showing 10 times to reduce noise.
